member.name: T:GSA.Search.WebApi.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator
member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:GSA.Search.WebApi.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: T:GSA.Search.WebApi.Controllers.FeedController
member.summary: API controller that handles pushing feeds to the Google Search Appliance

member.name: M:GSA.Search.WebApi.Controllers.FeedController.Post(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sends the specified url to be updated by the Google Search Appliance
member.param: The url to update. Must be properly url-encoded
The system name that should receive the update. Supported values are: "Klara", "SuntLiv", "Klaratest", "SuntLivTest"

member.name: M:GSA.Search.WebApi.Controllers.FeedController.Delete(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sends the specified url to be deleted from the Google Search Appliance index
member.param: The url to delete. Must be properly url-encoded
The system name that should receive the delete. Supported values are: "Klara", "SuntLiv", "Klaratest", "SuntLivTest"

member.name: T:GSA.Search.WebApi.Controllers.SearchController
member.summary: API controller that handles all search based calls

member.name: M:GSA.Search.WebApi.Controllers.SearchController.Get(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: A search request. All parameters are optional, although it's good practice to at least provide a query.
member.param: The query as inputted by the user
The system name that performs the search. Supported values are: "Klara", "SuntLiv", "Klaratest", "SuntLivTest"
The Collections in which to search for hits. You can use . (AND) or | (OR) to search in several collections.
A string that indicates a valid front end
The maximum number of hits to return. Default is 10. Maximum is 100.

The required metadata fields that the hits must contain in order to be returned. Should be separated by |. The values specified will be required to exist as a metadata tag on page for it to be included in the result.

Metadata fields that are partially required, that means the metadatafield and value must contain the specified word or phrases. For example specifying "dep" for a partialfield would return hits that contains the metadatafield "department" and "depending". Should be separated by |

member.name: T:GSA.Search.WebApi.Controllers.SuggestController
member.summary: API controller that handles all suggest base calls

member.name: M:GSA.Search.WebApi.Controllers.SuggestController.Get(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Provides suggestions that complete a user's search query.
member.param: The partial query as inputted by the user
The system name that performs the search. Supported values are: "Klara", "SuntLiv", "Klaratest", "SuntLivTest"
The Collections in which to search for hits. You can use . (AND) or | (OR) to search in several collections.
A string that indicates a valid front end

The maximum number of results that the suggest server should return. The minimum is 0, which indicates that the server should return an empty set, however this result would not be meaningful. Maximum is not set. Default is 10. If fewer suggestions are configured, then they are returned.
